snippet.title: Making My First Indie Game | Echoes Devlog 0
snippet.description:
After over a decade I'm finally committing to a game and releasing it by my 30th birthday in July 2024!

- socials
twitter: https://twitter.com/bumbleborn
website: https://bumbleborn.com/
Emily's twitter: https://twitter.com/eelizabethhCA

- chapters
0:00 - Intro
1:39 - Echo's Climb
2:32 - Wunderwurld
3:30 - Echo: The Oracle's Scroll
5:46 - Outro

- references
GMTK | Developing Series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLc38fcMFcV_uH3OK4sTa4bf-UXGk2NW2n
SquidGod's Metroidvania video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LEiJD-uS6u4
Follow up tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7GbUxjE9rRM

#indiegame #gamedev #playdate #devlog
